LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Grasses.label: Trial of the Grasses
LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Grasses.description: Perform the barbaric witcher trial of the grasses.
LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Dreams.label: Trial of the Dreams
LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Dreams.description: The secret ritual that grants the witchers their famous eyes.
LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Elders.label: Trial of the Elders
LanguageData.WitcherTrials_Recipe_Elders.description: The forgotton knowledge of Kaer Morhen, only Geralt is known to have survived this trial.
